jobDescription: Under general supervision, the MarComm Specialist will be responsible for executing marketing campaigns and data analysis of the results; calculating the results and maintaining product promotion information.This position will report directly to the Director of Marketing.Job Responsibilities:Support Marketing Managers to develop, execute, and claim channel marketing programs.Collaborate with Product Managers and Sales to deliver marketing and sales programs.Design promotions and track campaign performance.Learn to provide business insight through data analysis of marketing activities.Evaluate multiple sales incentive reports and come up with new promotion proposal.Support Director of Marketing in various projects as required.Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Marketing or business related fields.1-2 year experience in Marketing, preferably in PC related industries.Ability to interpret a wide variety of technical and numerous data.Strong MS Excel and PowerPoint skills required and able to show excel project portfolio.Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, strong teamwork skills, and the ability to collaborate and drive enthusiasm at every level.Ability to multitask and deliver projects by deadlines.Excellent attention to details and well organized.Understanding of the channel distribution market is a plus.Understanding of the computer hardware business is a plus.Bilingual skills is a plus
